activities:
We are a generic Web hosting provider that specializes in a portal/web content management system that is used for various purposes by our tenants.  Customers sign up through PayPal for our service, which is where all PII is stored.  

We operate from a PCI-I compliant facility and follow best practices in consideration of clients that includes companies with HIPPA, FERPA, and PCI-related sensitivities. Our privacy policy applies specifically to data and practices relating to Omegabit customer services and billing operations.  Customers assume responsibility for data stored in our environment and provided options concerning encryption and data protection with in the application to meet their specific business needs and security/privacy requirements.  We are akin to a telco or rack space provider in that however the tenant applies the software is their direct responsibility, but we ensure EU/SH compliance for that container and our services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We store basic customer contact and billing information as well as client passwords.  Please see the privacy statement for details.
